TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`3<T1, T2, T3> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此元组的第一个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此元组的第二个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's second component.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: 此元组的第三个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's third component.

summary.span: 表示 3 元组，或三元组。

span.span: Represents a 3-tuple, or triple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定的数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示 3 元组，或三倍，这是有三个组件的元组。The class represents a 3-tuple, or triple, which is a tuple that has three components. 可以实例化对象通过调用构造函数或静态方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 你可以通过使用只读的检索此元组的组件的值， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the values of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , and instance properties. 元组常用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 来表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，一个元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义一个数组包含学生、 其平均测试的比分和执行的测试的数量的名称的对象。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 数组传递给`ComputeStatistics`方法，该计算的平均值和标准偏差测试分数的方法。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean and standard deviation of the test scores. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要通过无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例返回其摘要的测试中的评分统计信息对象。For example, the previous example returns its summary test score statistics in a object. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，你可以提供一个值，则在启动线程执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果你提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供有三个项的数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with three items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态方法实例化 3 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 3-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个三元组，其组件类型的， ，和。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 3-tuple whose components are of type , , and . span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在下列情况下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 其三个组件都是与当前实例相同的类型。Its three components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其三个组件是等于当前实例。Its three components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来确定是否有任何数组中的对象对象是否等于另一个。The following example calls the method to determine whether any of the objects in an array of objects are equal to one another. 输出反映的情况是，方法返回`true`比较时其组件具有相等的值的对象。The output reflects the fact that the method returns `true` when comparing objects whose components have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第一个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组包含学生、 其平均测试的比分和执行的测试的数量的名称的对象。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 数组传递给`ComputeStatistics`方法，以计算平均分数、 标准偏差和事例数从则计算统计信息。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean score, standard deviation, and number of cases from which the statistics are calculated. 这些值存储在返回的对象`ComputeStatistics`方法。These values are stored in the object that is returned by the `ComputeStatistics` method. 属性包含的事例数。The property contains the number of cases. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: int IStructuralComparable.CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo
virtual int System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralComparable::CompareTo;

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，它通常由排序包括的方法的集合参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由方法和方法通过实例化的对象构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组组成学生的名称、 平均测验分数和的测试数的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它显示未排序顺序中的数组中的每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组的值。It displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要对数组进行排序，该示例定义了一个泛型`ScoreComparer`类，该类实现接口和排序按其第二个组件，而不是其第一个分量的值的升序顺序中的对象。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `ScoreComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their second component rather than their first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: bool IStructuralEquatable.Equals (object other, System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals
virtual bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable::Equals;

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值根据指定的比较方法指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不`null`，和可以成功地强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic 中) 转换为对象的组件与当前实例相同的类型。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法第一个传递值对象要进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，再次调用该方法并将其传递这两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用返回`true`同样，此方法叫做第三个时间和传递这两个值对象。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Item2Comparer`类，该类实现接口，并更改的方式对象计算是否相等。The following example defines an `Item2Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 该方法始终返回`true`当传递属性值的两个对象，并调用方法来计算其属性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the property values of two objects, and it calls the method to evaluate their property values. 如果此方法调用返回`true`、 其属性值将传递到方法，后者始终返回`true`。If this method call returns `true`, their property values are passed to the method, which always returns `true`. 该方法仅基于值的相等性测试的结果是，属性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the value of the property. 输出说明了数据集的结果类中记录的名称、 平均测验分数和学生的测试数的对象。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the names, mean test score, and number of tests of students in a class. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，它通常由默认重载的集合排序方法，如和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用的默认对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组对象的组件中包含的学生的名称、 平均测验分数和的测试数。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它显示未排序顺序中的数组中的每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按其第一个组件排序数组。The output shows that the array has been sorted by its first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方法返回的字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*，和*Item3*表示的值， ，和属性，分别。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, and *Item3* represent the values of the , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为`null`，它会表示为。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example illustrates the method. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
